Gives some extra health to the second player playing on splitscreen. 

ğ—ªğ—µğ˜†?
Trying to learn some basic scripting stuff on BO3! So I wanted to help a redditor that asked for this specific feature while playing with his girlfriend.

ğ—Ÿğ—¼ğ—´ğ—¶ğ—°
Players base health when spawning is 100, Juggernog just adds a +100 on the base health.
The splitscreen second player will now have 400 as base health, so 500 with Juggernog!

This mod does nothing if there's no splitscreen second player.
Title: Little Brother Mod
